Bash("C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.0\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root -p123456 shenxun -e "SHOW TABLES LIKE ''app_%knowledge%'';")
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.0\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root -p123456 shenxun -e "SHOW TABLES LIKE ''app_rag%'';")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.0\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root -p123456 shenxun -e "SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_COMMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''app_deployment_task'' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.0\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root -p123456 shenxun --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -e "
SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_COMMENT 
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ''shenxun'' 
AND TABLE_NAME IN \(''app_training_files'', ''app_training_tasks''\) 
AND COLUMN_NAME = ''system_prompt'';
")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\MySQL\\MySQL Server 8.0\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root -p123456 shenxun --default-character-set=utf8mb4 -e "SELECT job_id, job_name, job_group, invoke_target, status FROM sys_job WHERE invoke_target LIKE ''%training%'';")
